amendment.description: To provide that $10,000,000 should be made available to reduce the threat that man-portable air defense systems could be acquired by terrorists or by state sponsors of terrorism.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3692 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3692 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Boxer. (consideration: CR S9588-9592; text: CR S9589) To provide that $10,000,000 should be made available to reduce the threat that man-portable air defense systems could be acquired by terrorists or by state sponsors of terrorism.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3692 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3692 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Boxer.
